casebody.data:
STATE
v.
DESPERADOS, INC. and Perez. No. 629A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2006. Jeffrey S. Miller, for Desperados & Perez. Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 638 S.E.2d 4.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of December 2006."
